question: The recently conducted trial run of the first double stack freight train connects which of the following?
explanation: On December 2019, Dedicated Freight Corporation of India Limited conducted the trial run of the first-ever double stack freight train. It will connect the Rewari-Madar Section in Haryana and Rajashan. The other countries that currently have double stack train are China, Russia, USA, Brazil, Australia, Canada, South Africa, Sweden and Norway.
